name: Knot 3D
description:
Have you ever heard about Chinese wood knots? If you’re not familiar with them, I’m sure you know the Magic Cube. We all went crazy handling the Magic Cube, and it was our source of inspiration for making Knot.

Knot 3D is a mechanical puzzle game where you move and rotate interlocked blocks to disassemble puzzles.

This burr puzzle game combines stunning visuals with relaxing and captivating gameplay.

With the perfect atmosphere, the player can relax but feel challenged and stimulated at the same time.

The game features 40 unique brain teasers with photo realistic graphics and 20 unique materials.

-- 40 unique brain teasers
-- 20 unique materials
-- Realistic physics and graphics
-- 3D parallax view

Having trouble? info@warlockarts.com
publishers: Warlock Arts Yazilim Sanayi ve Ticaret Limited Sirketi
